explanation: [0-0] At the beginning of the video, a young man and a young woman are standing on the sidewalk in front of their houses. The man, wearing a beige polo shirt and black trousers, with a watch on his left wrist, stands in front of a red brick house. A cartoon little girl in a light red dress stands on the grass in front of him. The little girl has two brown ponytails and wears light red shoes. The capital letter A is written below her. The woman, wearing a yellow long-sleeved shirt and gray trousers, stands in front of a white-walled house. A cartoon little girl in a green T-shirt and blue-green pleated skirt stands on the grass in front of her. The little girl has two orange-yellow braids decorated with blue-green bows, and wears off-white stockings and light red shoes. The capital letter B is written below her.

[0-5] The young man and woman walk forward simultaneously, stop in front of the little girls, wave to each other, pick up the little girl in front of them, turn around and leave in opposite directions.

[0-5] The young man and woman walk forward simultaneously, stop in front of the little girls, wave to each other, pick up the little girl in front of them, turn around and leave in opposite directions.

[5-12] The video then cuts into two split screens, upper and lower. The upper part shows the living room of the man's house, with a large window, brown and gray cabinets below, and an off-white refrigerator on the right side of the frame. The floor is brownish-green. The capital letter A appears in the upper left corner. The lower part shows the living room of the woman's house, with a picture frame of a sailboat hanging on the light purple wall, a rose-red cabinet next to an orange sofa, a rose-red table lamp and a green landline phone on the cabinet. The floor is green, and the capital letter B appears in the upper left corner. There is a green progress bar at the top of both frames, with stacks of coins next to them. The man and the woman stand on the right side of the frame respectively, and the daughters they choose come in from the left side of the frame. Both little girls express their desire for a brown teddy bear. The man exchanges the coins for four different colored plush teddy bears for his daughter and strokes her head. The woman gives her daughter a stack of books and waves to her. Her daughter leaves from the left side of the frame with the books in her arms. The progress bar at the top of the frame is missing one-fifth, and the progress bar at the bottom of the frame is missing three-fifths.

[20-27] Then the scene changes. The upper part shows the man standing in a living room with brown walls, a blue sofa and dark brown floors. His daughter has grown up. Her long brown hair is tied in braids over her left shoulder and she is wearing a pink vest dress. The daughter asks the man for money, and the man nods and gives all the remaining money to his daughter. The man waves to his daughter, and the daughter leaves from the left side of the frame with the money. Immediately afterwards, the scene switches to a ballroom flashing with colorful lights. The man's daughter changes into a dark blue dress and dances with some people in colorful costumes. The background of the lower part is a building with brown and red exterior walls, with the word "UNIVERSITY" on it. The woman brings her daughter to the front of the building and uses all the remaining money to pay for her daughter's tuition. The grown-up daughter is wearing a light red top and blue jeans. The woman waves to her daughter, and the daughter successfully enters the university. The woman leaves from the right side of the frame.

The man frowns, shakes his head, and reaches into his pockets, only to find them empty. His daughter leaves after seeing this, and the man covers his face with his hands and stands still. The progress bar above is still empty. The lower part shows the living room of the woman's house, decorated in the same way as at the beginning of the video. The woman stands on the right side of the frame, rummaging through her pockets with both hands, her face showing distress. Then she covers her face with her hands. At this time, her daughter, with short brown hair, wearing an off-white top and a black skirt, comes in from the left side of the frame and gives her a lot of money. The progress bar above turns full green again. The woman puts her hands to her mouth, relieved and happy, looking at her daughter and expressing her gratitude.
